channel.title: would you fight the dev team or never get to play BMS.
channel.description: what if the dev team gave up at the last second and the only way to get black mesa to be finished is to find where they live and beat the crap out of them which would you rather do fight the dev team or never play BMS.

item.title: would you fight the dev team or never get to play BMS.
item.dc:creator: exion
item.description:
The Marine in the Doom Comic:

I’m cookin’ with gas! I’ve gotta handful of vertebrae and a headful of mad! Yeah, that’s your spinal cord, baby! Dig it! Who’s the man? I’m the man! I’m a bad man! How bad? Real Bad! I’m a 12.0 on a 10.0 scale of badness! Don’t need a gun…

…GUNS ARE FOR WUSSES!

Second thoughts, I’d probably just sit disappointed and get on with my university coursework. The devs are all too far away to be intimidated by my puny fists…

Read full topic
item.source: would you fight the dev team or never get to play BMS.

item.title: would you fight the dev team or never get to play BMS.
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
darkone:

what if the dev team gave up at the last second and the only way to get black mesa to be finished is to find where they live and beat the crap out of them which would you rather do fight the dev team or never play BMS.

What the heck is wrong with you? I mean really. :freeman:

Omega_Absolute:

Well, I’ll take Catz. You guys get the rest.

First round of shots is on me baby! Anyone else coming over for the party?

item.title: would you fight the dev team or never get to play BMS.
item.dc:creator: Kaze
item.description:
hercule poirots nutsack:

i have an enormous machete with photos of every one of your homes stuck to it with fridge magnets. I’ll remove each pic after its used up so the job will probably get easier as I go. This is a legitimate threat and its fucken difficult to get polaroid film nowadays so you know I’m serious.

This post wasn’t funny at all until the last sentence because I fucking lost it when I read that.

Read full topic
